title: ISic001761. I.Sicily inscription 001761
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΕΝΘΑΔΕΩΔΕΚΙΤΕΙΕ
2ΝΑΡΙΑΑΠΟΘΑΝΑΣΑΗΜΕ
3ΡΑΗΛΙΟΥΠ͡ΡΟΔ´ΕΙΔΩ͡ΝΙΑ
4ΝΟΥΑΡΙΩΝ

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of Gradante from autopsy;
  • 3: Orsi: ΕΙΔΩ(v.)ΙΑ

English translation

Here lies Ienaria as she is, having died on the day of the sun, four days before the Ides of January.

commentary

bibliography

  • Orsi 1893 288 no.42 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001715
  • Strazzulla 1897 141 no. 176 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001390
  • Wessel 1989 243 no. 1043 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000394
